gameDetails.name: Century: Spice Road â€“ Bonus Cards 2
gameDetails.description:
A set of 3 cards plus a rules card given out to backers of The Dice Tower 2018 Kickstarter campaign.

"Take 1 cube of the depicted color from the bowls and upgrade 1 cube (this upgrade may be applied on the cube you just received."

"Trade 3 yellow cubes for 1 brown cube or for 2 red cubes. If you have 6 or 9 yellow cubes for trade, you can get a mix of brown and red cubes (each trade of 3 yellow cubes is independent)."
